title: Roast asparagus with prosciutto and poached egg
ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus, trimmed', '1 tablespoon extra virgin olive oil', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '60g prosciutto, finely chopped', 'black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon vinegar', '1 pinch salt', '4 eggs', '1 lemon, zested and juiced']
